summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Butecare Eyelash Growth Enhancer & Brow Serum for Long - Amazon Vine Review Date: 2019/03/09 Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.5 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} Review Text: This is my own personal experience with this lash growth enhancer and my own opinion. I did not notice any difference in my lashes since I started using it a month ago. I've documented my experience with pictures every 3 days. I gave it 2 stars and not 1 because I've seen that it's worked for others but I guess it isn't compatible with my biology. I'm bit disappointed. Review Title: Didn't work for me. Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Water Flosser Cordless Teeth Cleaner, SOOCAS Professional Oral Irrigator 230ML Portable and Rechargeable Water Dental Flosser with 3 Modes and 4 Jet Tips, IPX7 Waterproof, USB Charged for 30 Days Use Review Date: 2019/04/23 Store: SOOCAS Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SOOCAS', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Special Feature': 'Por, Multiple Operation Modes, Multiple Tips', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Tank Volume': '230 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 4.41 x 3.23 inches; 1.08 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SOOCAS W3', 'Manufacturer': 'SOOCAS'} Review Text: I wasn't expecting my mirror to get a cleaning also! I was excited to finally have a water pick so when I received my package I immediately set it up and studied the directions. Once I was confident, I began and as soon as i turn it on, water went everywhere! It all ricochet ed all oclver my bathroom counter and mirror. Safe to say that you literally need to use this in the shower. But besides that, it has many attachments, different speeds and does a great job! Review Title: Messy but works great! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Way Of Will Sweet Orange Body Wash, Moisturizing Body Wash with Sweet Orange Essential Oil, Body Wash for Women and Men, Paraben and Sulfate Free, 120 mL Review Date: 2020/01/03 Store: Way Of Will Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'Oily,All Skin Types', 'Brand': 'Way Of Will', 'Scent': 'Sweet Orange', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben,Sulfate Free', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '840652000191'} Review Text: This body wash is excellent. The scent is delicious, like real orange, the lather is thick with small bubbles, and it noticeably moisturizes your skin. The only drawback is the price. It's currently listed for $10 for 4 ounces, which is basically travel size. Review Title: Excellent Quality Body Wash Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: BRING GREEN Super Yulmu Pore Deep Cleansing Foam 200ml - Adlay Seed Powder and Clay Contained Exfoliating Rich Foam Cleanser, Remove Dead Skin Cells & Blackeads, Moisturizing Deep Cleanser Review Date: 2020/01/28 Store: BRING GREEN Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Brand': 'BRING GREEN', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1'} Review Text: I really like the consistency of this face wash. It's like wet clay, with a gentle and pleasant scent. It has just the right amount of lather and it spreads very easily over my face. The only drawback is that is will dry your face out. I suppose this can be countered with a basic facial moisturizer. Review Title: Deep Cleaning Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: C.O. Bigelow Shampoo, Lavender Peppermint Shampoo Cleanses & Soothes Hair & Scalp, Luxury Shampoo for Men & Women, 10.4 Fl Oz. Review Date: 2020/01/30 Store: C. O. Bigelow Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'C. O. Bigelow', 'Item Form': 'Lotion,Liquid,Gel', 'Scent': 'Fresh,Lavender,Peppermint', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Package Dimensions': '5.91 x 2.32 x 2.24 inches; 10.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '815691009023'} Review Text: This shampoo smells great. The scent is very natural, but unfortunately it's not. Rather than using the pricier essential oils of peppermint and lavender, the company uses synthesized fragrance. The lather is decent and washes your hair about as well as any bargain-priced brand from the supermarket shelf. I did notice that it leaves my hair feeling a bit flat. There is no reason for the high price aside from name familiarity, as this brand is used by some hotel chains. Review Title: Overpriced for What You're Getting Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Taya Beauty Inner Core Hair Strong Anti-Breakage Shampoo & Conditioner Duo - Strengthening and Repairing Formula - Free From Sulfates and Parabens - 8 fl oz Bottles Review Date: 2020/02/06 Store: TAYA I AM. Product Description: ['INNER CORE SHAMPOO: Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Acrylates Copolymer, Glycerin, Glycol Distearate, Bambusa Vulgaris Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Panthenol, Dimethicone, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol, Bis-Cetearyl Amodimethicone, Polyquaternium-11, Laureth-4, Laureth-23, Decylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Amodimethicone, Cocamide MIPA, Trideceth-12, Kaolin, Polysorbate 20, Fragrance/Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Coconut Acid, Sodium Methyltaurate, Isopropanolamine, Tocopherol, Salicylic Acid, Cyclotetrasiloxane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool. INNER CORE CONDITIONER: Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Polysorbate 60, Bambusa Vulgaris Extract, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Dimethicone, Divinyldimethicone/Dimethicone Copolymer, Polyquaternium-37, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Dicetyldimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Polyquaternium-7, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Cetyl Alcohol, Trideceth-12, C11-15 Pareth-7, C12-13 Pareth-23, C12-13 Pareth-3, Decylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, PEG-90M, Tetrasodium EDTA, Buteth-3, C10-40 Isoalkylamidopropylethyldimonium Ethosulfate, Sodium Benzotriazolyl Butylphenol Sulfonate, Laureth-9, Tributyl Citrate, Citric Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Kaolin, Yellow 6/CI 15985, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbitan Oleate, Acrylates/Stearyl Methacrylate Copolymer, C10-11 Isoparaffin, Isopropyl Alcohol, Trisodium HEDTA, Silica, BHT, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool.'] Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Repairing,Cleanses,Breakage', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'TAYA I AM.', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Color Treated, Curly, Damaged, Thin', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 4.53 x 2.09 inches; 1 Pounds', 'Item model number': '3.00', 'UPC': '858308002185'} Review Text: I love the combination of this shampoo and conditioner. Both smell like sweet coconut.
The shampoo has a thick and luxurious lather and definitely feels like it adds volume to my hair.
The conditioner is thick, but light, a bit like a body butter. It softens my hair and leaves it extremely soft and silky.
The only reason I can't give these products five stars is because I think they're a bit overpriced. Yes, they create great results, but so do a lot of comparable brands that are less than half the price. Review Title: A Great Combination Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Beast Blue Ultra Cooling Body Wash, 6 oz -Beast Review Date: 2020/02/29 Store: Tame the Beast Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Tame the Beast', 'Scent': 'Green Tea', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 3 x 2 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '817662018539'} Review Text: This is definitely a "cooling" body wash. It makes my skin tingle and would be excellent in the summer months when you need to bring your body temperature down. The scent is like menthol-eucalyptus, but a bit sweeter. The lather is very thick and smooth, and it rinses away leaving my skin feeling cool and moisturized. The only reason for the 4-star rating is the price. $15 is a bit much for 6 ounces of product. Review Title: Cool and Moisturizing Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Gents of London Design Paste Matt Firm Hold Professional Hair Styling Wax (3 oz) Review Date: 2020/03/04 Store: GENTS OF LONDON Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Liquid Volume': '3 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Brand': 'GENTS OF LONDON'} Review Text: This is a great product. The hold is strong, the finish is truly matte, and the price is a lot better than comparable clays, waxes and fibers. It has a light, masculine scent. Review Title: Great Hold and Finish Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: TheSalonGuy CLUTCH Matte Styling Clay Firm Hold Matte Finish Pliable Texture 3.5 oz Review Date: 2020/06/26 Store: THESALONGUY Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Liquid Volume': '3.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Brand': 'THESALONGUY', 'Number of Items': '1', 'UPC': '860344000636'} Review Text: Applying to medium length hair with a light prestyler.

Scent: Very spicy. Christmas spices.
Texture: Waxy clay. Very thick.
Application: Thick and a bit tough to emulsify in the hands. A bit sticky during application.
Styling: Pretty responsive, but you have to work quickly.
Finish: Very high hold. Fairly low shine, but not matte. Review Title: Great Hold, but Sticky Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: No Brainer Gentle Facial Cleanser, 6 fl. oz, For Dry & Sensitive Skin, Leaves Skin Feeling Clean, Soft and Hydrated, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein & Amino Acids Restores Skin by Higher Education Skincare Review Date: 2020/06/30 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381030056'} Review Text: Aside from being a tad overpriced for a daily face wash, this stuff is great. It smells like cucumber - clean and fresh, it has the consistency of aloe vera gel but a bit thicker. The lather is low-foam. It feels great on my skin, and leaves it feeling soft and moisturized. Definitely a high quality product. Review Title: Fresh and Moisturizing Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare Review Date: 2020/06/30 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'} Review Text: Pricey, but it’s a high quality scrub. Great texture and exfoliation. Review Title: A Soft, Moisturized Finish Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 6 Pack Spray Bottles,Empty Plastic Clear Small Transparent Travel Bottles Pump Bottle Lotion Dispenser Bottle Set,Refillable Liquid Containers 3oz and 2 oz Review Date: 2020/07/09 Store: Cehomi Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 6.14 x 1.1 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} Review Text: These bottles are very good quality. All in perfect working order. They’re a great buy for the price. Review Title: Really Nice Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Higher Education Skincare: Goal Digger - Silky Moisturizing Cucumber Creme; formulated for dry and sensitive skin; cucumber extract; natural extract: melon, kale, cabbage, ginger, turmeric - 1.7 fl oz Review Date: 2020/07/09 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Scent': 'Cucumber', 'Item Form': 'Creme', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.88 x 2.88 x 2.13 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381032050'} Review Text: I really like this moisturizer. The consistency is extremely soft and smooth, and it feels incredible on my skin. It moisturizes wonderfully and feels like it actually fortifies the skin, making it feel thicker and stronger. The scent is very fresh and it absorbs well. I am already noticing (after a few days) a slight lightening of the skin under my eyes, which is exciting. A bit pricey, but definitely high quality. Review Title: High Quality Face Moisturizer Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: TheSalonGuy Pre Game Extreme Hold Wax Paste 3.5oz Review Date: 2020/07/10 Store: THESALONGUY Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Liquid Volume': '3.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Brand': 'THESALONGUY', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 5 x 3 inches; 3.52 Ounces', 'UPC': '860242002480'} Review Text: This is a very unique and effective product.

Used with a light pre-styler on medium-length hair:

Scent: It's a light scent. Warm and slightly spiced. Very pleasant and masculine.
Consistency: Extremely creamy. Becomes slightly tacky when emulsifying.
Styling: Smooth through the hair at first, with increasing tug the more you style. This is not a problem for me and is part of getting great hold from a product.
Finish: Slightly shiny at first, but becomes much more matte as it dries in the hair.
Hold: Legitimate all-day hold without becoming too rigid to restyle.

This is one of my new favorites. Seriously good in all areas, which is so rare. TheSalonGuy has a real winner with this one. Review Title: Excellent in All Areas Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Winky Lux Pop Sugar Eyeshadow Palette | 9 Colorful Shades in Metallic, Satin, Matte, Glitter & Pressed Glitter finishes Review Date: 2020/07/19 Store: Winky Lux Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Color': 'Ivory, Black', 'Brand': 'Winky Lux', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Satin', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Package Dimensions': '4.33 x 4.29 x 0.59 inches; 0.53 Ounces', 'UPC': '818324022086'} Review Text: This is a very decent palette for the price. I like the shades offered, and they are of good quality. Review Title: A Good Addition Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Natural Waterproof Mascara Extra Long Lash,Thick Thickening and Lengthening, No Clumping, No Smudging, Lasting Voluminous Eyelashes Dramatic Extension Mascara Review Date: 2020/07/31 Store: SIKEMAY Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Color': 'Black', 'Special Feature': 'Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676852', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'} Review Text: Never heard of this brand but it was definitely the packaging that caught my attention. The saying "never judge a book by its cover" does NOT apply in this CASE. PLEASE try out this mascara. My lashes looked significantly longer and thicker with out any flakes or clumps. A very long lasting mascara for a relatively decent price. Also, considering how long lasting it wore, the removal was insanely easy. I love this mascara! Review Title: Impressed! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: SELF/ish Men's Face Scrub | Exfoliating Facial Cleanser | Deep Cleansing | Effective Shave Prep & Beard Exfoliator for Men | Natural Ingredients | 3.4fl oz Review Date: 2020/08/19 Store: MELARQT Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MELARQT', 'Item Form': 'Scrub', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.26 x 2.09 x 2.01 inches; 4.73 Ounces', 'Department': 'Men', 'UPC': '810042384002'} Review Text: Though a bit pricey at $20 for 3.4 ounces, this face scrub does deliver solid results. It smells great, very fresh and masculine. It thoroughly exfoliates my skin and leaves it feeling soft, clean, smooth and moisturized. I've found that it's great to use before shaving, as it preps the skin by smoothing and moisturizing it. Review Title: A Multi-Benefit Exfoliator Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Butecare Eyelash Growth Enhancer & Brow Serum for Long - Amazon Vine Review Date: 2019/03/09 Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.5 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} Review Text: This is my own personal experience with this lash growth enhancer and my own opinion. I did not notice any difference in my lashes since I started using it a month ago. I've documented my experience with pictures every 3 days. I gave it 2 stars and not 1 because I've seen that it's worked for others but I guess it isn't compatible with my biology. I'm bit disappointed. Review Title: Didn't work for me. Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Water Flosser Cordless Teeth Cleaner, SOOCAS Professional Oral Irrigator 230ML Portable and Rechargeable Water Dental Flosser with 3 Modes and 4 Jet Tips, IPX7 Waterproof, USB Charged for 30 Days Use Review Date: 2019/04/23 Store: SOOCAS Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SOOCAS', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Special Feature': 'Por, Multiple Operation Modes, Multiple Tips', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Tank Volume': '230 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 4.41 x 3.23 inches; 1.08 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SOOCAS W3', 'Manufacturer': 'SOOCAS'} Review Text: I wasn't expecting my mirror to get a cleaning also! I was excited to finally have a water pick so when I received my package I immediately set it up and studied the directions. Once I was confident, I began and as soon as i turn it on, water went everywhere! It all ricochet ed all oclver my bathroom counter and mirror. Safe to say that you literally need to use this in the shower. But besides that, it has many attachments, different speeds and does a great job! Review Title: Messy but works great! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Way Of Will Sweet Orange Body Wash, Moisturizing Body Wash with Sweet Orange Essential Oil, Body Wash for Women and Men, Paraben and Sulfate Free, 120 mL Review Date: 2020/01/03 Store: Way Of Will Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'Oily,All Skin Types', 'Brand': 'Way Of Will', 'Scent': 'Sweet Orange', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben,Sulfate Free', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '840652000191'} Review Text: This body wash is excellent. The scent is delicious, like real orange, the lather is thick with small bubbles, and it noticeably moisturizes your skin. The only drawback is the price. It's currently listed for $10 for 4 ounces, which is basically travel size. Review Title: Excellent Quality Body Wash Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: BRING GREEN Super Yulmu Pore Deep Cleansing Foam 200ml - Adlay Seed Powder and Clay Contained Exfoliating Rich Foam Cleanser, Remove Dead Skin Cells & Blackeads, Moisturizing Deep Cleanser Review Date: 2020/01/28 Store: BRING GREEN Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Brand': 'BRING GREEN', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1'} Review Text: I really like the consistency of this face wash. It's like wet clay, with a gentle and pleasant scent. It has just the right amount of lather and it spreads very easily over my face. The only drawback is that is will dry your face out. I suppose this can be countered with a basic facial moisturizer. Review Title: Deep Cleaning Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: C.O. Bigelow Shampoo, Lavender Peppermint Shampoo Cleanses & Soothes Hair & Scalp, Luxury Shampoo for Men & Women, 10.4 Fl Oz. Review Date: 2020/01/30 Store: C. O. Bigelow Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'C. O. Bigelow', 'Item Form': 'Lotion,Liquid,Gel', 'Scent': 'Fresh,Lavender,Peppermint', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Package Dimensions': '5.91 x 2.32 x 2.24 inches; 10.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '815691009023'} Review Text: This shampoo smells great. The scent is very natural, but unfortunately it's not. Rather than using the pricier essential oils of peppermint and lavender, the company uses synthesized fragrance. The lather is decent and washes your hair about as well as any bargain-priced brand from the supermarket shelf. I did notice that it leaves my hair feeling a bit flat. There is no reason for the high price aside from name familiarity, as this brand is used by some hotel chains. Review Title: Overpriced for What You're Getting Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Taya Beauty Inner Core Hair Strong Anti-Breakage Shampoo & Conditioner Duo - Strengthening and Repairing Formula - Free From Sulfates and Parabens - 8 fl oz Bottles Review Date: 2020/02/06 Store: TAYA I AM. Product Description: ['INNER CORE SHAMPOO: Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Acrylates Copolymer, Glycerin, Glycol Distearate, Bambusa Vulgaris Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Panthenol, Dimethicone, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol, Bis-Cetearyl Amodimethicone, Polyquaternium-11, Laureth-4, Laureth-23, Decylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Amodimethicone, Cocamide MIPA, Trideceth-12, Kaolin, Polysorbate 20, Fragrance/Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Coconut Acid, Sodium Methyltaurate, Isopropanolamine, Tocopherol, Salicylic Acid, Cyclotetrasiloxane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool. INNER CORE CONDITIONER: Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Polysorbate 60, Bambusa Vulgaris Extract, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Dimethicone, Divinyldimethicone/Dimethicone Copolymer, Polyquaternium-37, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Dicetyldimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Polyquaternium-7, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Cetyl Alcohol, Trideceth-12, C11-15 Pareth-7, C12-13 Pareth-23, C12-13 Pareth-3, Decylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, PEG-90M, Tetrasodium EDTA, Buteth-3, C10-40 Isoalkylamidopropylethyldimonium Ethosulfate, Sodium Benzotriazolyl Butylphenol Sulfonate, Laureth-9, Tributyl Citrate, Citric Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Kaolin, Yellow 6/CI 15985, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbitan Oleate, Acrylates/Stearyl Methacrylate Copolymer, C10-11 Isoparaffin, Isopropyl Alcohol, Trisodium HEDTA, Silica, BHT, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool.'] Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Repairing,Cleanses,Breakage', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'TAYA I AM.', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Color Treated, Curly, Damaged, Thin', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 4.53 x 2.09 inches; 1 Pounds', 'Item model number': '3.00', 'UPC': '858308002185'} Review Text: I love the combination of this shampoo and conditioner. Both smell like sweet coconut.
The shampoo has a thick and luxurious lather and definitely feels like it adds volume to my hair.
The conditioner is thick, but light, a bit like a body butter. It softens my hair and leaves it extremely soft and silky.
The only reason I can't give these products five stars is because I think they're a bit overpriced. Yes, they create great results, but so do a lot of comparable brands that are less than half the price. The lather is very thick and smooth, and it rinses away leaving my skin feeling cool and moisturized. The only reason for the 4-star rating is the price. $15 is a bit much for 6 ounces of product. Review Title: Cool and Moisturizing Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Gents of London Design Paste Matt Firm Hold Professional Hair Styling Wax (3 oz) Review Date: 2020/03/04 Store: GENTS OF LONDON Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Liquid Volume': '3 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Brand': 'GENTS OF LONDON'} Review Text: This is a great product. Finish: Very high hold. Fairly low shine, but not matte. Review Title: Great Hold, but Sticky Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: No Brainer Gentle Facial Cleanser, 6 fl. oz, For Dry & Sensitive Skin, Leaves Skin Feeling Clean, Soft and Hydrated, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein & Amino Acids Restores Skin by Higher Education Skincare Review Date: 2020/06/30 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381030056'} Review Text: Aside from being a tad overpriced for a daily face wash, this stuff is great. It smells like cucumber - clean and fresh, it has the consistency of aloe vera gel but a bit thicker. The lather is low-foam. It feels great on my skin, and leaves it feeling soft and moisturized. Definitely a high quality product. Review Title: Fresh and Moisturizing Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare Review Date: 2020/06/30 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'} Review Text: Pricey, but it’s a high quality scrub. Review Title: Really Nice Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Higher Education Skincare: Goal Digger - Silky Moisturizing Cucumber Creme; formulated for dry and sensitive skin; cucumber extract; natural extract: melon, kale, cabbage, ginger, turmeric - 1.7 fl oz Review Date: 2020/07/09 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Scent': 'Cucumber', 'Item Form': 'Creme', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.88 x 2.88 x 2.13 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381032050'} Review Text: I really like this moisturizer. Review Title: High Quality Face Moisturizer Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: TheSalonGuy Pre Game Extreme Hold Wax Paste 3.5oz Review Date: 2020/07/10 Store: THESALONGUY Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Liquid Volume': '3.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Brand': 'THESALONGUY', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 5 x 3 inches; 3.52 Ounces', 'UPC': '860242002480'} Review Text: This is a very unique and effective product.

Consistency: Extremely creamy. Becomes slightly tacky when emulsifying.

Review Title: A Multi-Benefit Exfoliator Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual showcases a strong interest in personal care products, particularly in skin and hair care, emphasizing quality and performance over brand names. They consistently exhibit moderate price sensitivity, expressing disappointment or hesitation with products deemed overpriced, despite recognizing their effectiveness. 

In terms of product effectiveness, they appreciate products that deliver noticeable results, which is evident in the higher ratings for items that performed well (e.g., oral hygiene tools and deep cleansing products). However, there's a clear frustration with items that fail to meet expectations, particularly regarding lash care and shampoo, highlighting a tendency to rate products based on personal narratives of success or failure. 

Common themes include a preference for moisturizing, high-quality formulations with pleasing scents and textures, particularly in skincare and haircare lines. Additionally, the individual seems to favor versatile products that serve multiple purposes, such as scrubs that function as pre-shave treatments. 

Overall, their genuine preferences align with effective, well-scented products, mindful of price, showing an inclination toward high-quality skincare and haircare solutions that promise practical benefits while remaining skeptical of high-cost items without clear deliverables.

target_interaction.title: Pricey but Decent
target_interaction.text: This has worked pretty well for me over the past couple weeks of use, but I can’t say it’s worked better than products that cost half the price. It’s a good moisturizer, but it’s overpriced.
target_interaction.title_meta: Gentlehomme Face Moisturizer For Men - Mens Facial Lotion with Neroli Essential Oil Scent - Collagen & Stem Cells - Daily Anti-Aging Moisturizer for Dry & Oily Skin - 4 oz
